00003 FILE *open_log(char *full_log_path) {
00004         FILE *logfile = NULL;
00005 
00006         logfile = fopen(full_log_path, "w");
00007 
00008         if(logfile == NULL) {
00009                 fprintf(stderr, "WARNING: Could not open log file.\n");
00010         }
00011 
00012         return logfile;
00013 } /* open_log */
00014 
00015 void close_log(FILE *logfile) {
00016         int retstat = 0;
00017 
00018         retstat = fclose(logfile);
00019 
00020         if(retstat != 0) {
00021                 fprintf(stderr, "WARNING: Could not close log file.\n");
00022         }
00023 } /* close_log */
00024 
00025 void debug_init() {
00026         int res = 0;
00027 
00028         res = sem_init(&debug_sem, 0, 1);
00029 
00030         if(res < 0) {
00031                 fprintf(stderr, "ERROR: A problem occured during initialization.");
00032                 exit(EXIT_FAILURE);
00033         }
00034 }
